title: final hhd data for submission
abstract: Table of all patients included for home visits. Patients were identified by date of birth and hospital number which have been removed for confidentiality. Data extracted from our renal database. Outcome of visits supplied by renal social worker and predialysis nurse from logged home visits. Race as stated by patient. DM refers to diabetic or not, RRT refers to the modality of renal replacement implemented following home visit, DHS relates to whether home met basic government standards, HHSR code lists specific hazards in the home (max 4 per home listed) and temp accom refers to whether the accomodation was of a temporary nature, With regards RRT, APD donates automated peritoneal dialysis, CAPD continual ambulatory peritoneal dialysis, HD haemodialysis and the various initials following HD refer to the different renal units within out catchment
